item.title: Modest estate listed for ex-prince Andrew accuser in court battle
item.description: <p>Virginia Giuffre&#x27;s sons launched a legal case in the WA Supreme Court in June amid speculation their mother&#x27;s estate was worth more than $20 million.</p>
